item.title: MIUI 21.2.24 Recovery update for Mi 10 Pro China

New Weekly Recovery update available!

Device: Mi 10 Pro China

Codename: cmi

Version: 21.2.24 | 11.0

Size: 4.1 GB

MD5: 02ace0ba309d9989bcffa6e6181cf314

Changelog:
Bug fixes and system optimizations.

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI V12.2.1.0.RJAMIXM Fastboot update for Mi 10 Pro Global
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Mi 10 Pro Global

Codename: cmi

Version: V12.2.1.0.RJAMIXM | 11.0

Size: 4.8 GB

MD5: 1161f4c3120e16a53461aa6b0670e014

Changelog:
[Attention]
This update is a limited release for Mi Pilot testers, which means that the update process might take longer than usual. Expect heating and other performance issues after you update - it might take some time for your device to adapt to the new version. Remember that some third-party apps aren't yet compatible with Android R and you might not be able to use them normally.
[System]
Stable MIUI based on Android 11
Updated Android Security Patch to September 2020. Increased system security.
Stable MIUI based on Android 11
[Camera]
New: New AI moonscape functionality
New: New templates for vlogs
New: Vlogs can be now saved as drafts
Optimization: New vlog templates and presets will be available for downloading from the cloud from now on

Download: Here
